name: triceratops game
description:
this is a work in progress, hopefully i will finish it sometime.
let me know what you think on twitter: @justinchans

:)

INSTRUCTIONS

You play as a single Triceratop father (Tricerapops)
Protect your eggs and yourself from the neighbors by dashing.
Dashing uses energy. Energy regenerates over time.

Raptors will try to steal your eggs. 1 hit to kill.
Velociraptors will go after you and drain your dashing energy. 2 hits to kill.
Stegosaurs want to eat your grassy nest and will trample eggs. 2 hits to kill.

CONTROLS

WASD to move
LMB to dash towards the cursor
R to restart
X to lay eggs

TIPS

Try hitting multiple enemies with a single dash to save energy and get more points!
Try standing in your nest to hatch your eggs... (not finished)

Click F1 to see the game info anytime
